info.name: apply_video_event_detector
info.description:
A module that uses an eta.core.learning.VideoEventDetector to detect events
in a video

inputs.name: video_frames_dir
inputs.description: a directory containing the frames of the video

inputs.name: input_labels_path
inputs.description: an optional input VideoLabels file to which to add the detections

outputs.name: output_labels_path
outputs.description: a VideoLabels file containing the detections

parameters.name: detector
parameters.description: an eta.core.learning.VideoEventDetectorConfig describing the VideoEventDetector to use
